span.span: Gets a collection of instances .
A collection of correlation queries.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在此集合内填充一些查询，当消息到达终结点时将运行这些查询，以确定应将消息发送到哪个工作流实例。Populate this collection with queries that are run when a message arrives on the endpoint to determine which workflow instance the message should be sent to. 如果通过重写 提供自定义实例解析，则不需要使用此属性。This property does not need to be used if custom instance resolution is provided by overriding .
